page.title: 09Mission England
page.content: During the middle months of 1985, almost all denominations in our area were looking forward to{Mission} {England.}This was a visit by the evangelist{Billy Graham.}Posters were in most churches and pasted on boards all over the area. Billy Graham came to Sheffield United football stadium in the week beginning June 22nd. We saw him live but he was beamed via satellite to 51 centres across Britain and Ireland, and eight other countries. When we were there, there were 31,000 people and a choir of 4,000. Billy Graham was standing in the middle of the stadium on a platform talking to people, and talking about how we should live our lives and follow{Jesus.}
